game.name: Hexiv
game.categories: Single-player, Steam Achievements, Partial Controller Support, Steam Cloud, Steam Leaderboards, Family Sharing
game.shortDescription: Hexiv is a strategy deckbuilder about surviving on a lush but hostile planet. Use cards to build, explore, expand and feed your crew while battling a determined adversary to unlock the mysteries of this genre-blending roguelike!
